name: isNumericDate
description:
Evaluates whether a real number is a valid representation of a
 date (date/time object).

Same as isValid("date", date)

links.title: Learning IsNumericDate by Ben Nadel
links.description: Tutorial style article on using the IsNumericDate function in CFML.

examples.title: Simple example
examples.description: To determine whether a string can be converted to a date/time value.

examples.title: Simple example
examples.description: To determine whether a string can be converted to a date/time value.
